Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
EZ
High-level string-processing language derived from SNOBOL4, SL5 and Icon.
["The EZ Reference Manual", C.W. Fraser et al, CS TR 84-1, U Arizona, 1984].

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)
